content.heading: Security - Akshay & Chirag's ExperiencePreview
content.description: Akshay and Chirag are sharing their experience on security.

content.heading: Security Overview
content.description: Journey through crucial security principles, setting the foundation for a secure frontend. This foundational episode introduces pivotal concepts shaping the security landscape.

content.heading: Cross-site Scripting (XSS)
content.description: Discover the nuances of XSS vulnerabilities, empowering you to fortify your frontend against malicious script injections that threaten user security.

content.heading: iFrame Protection
content.description: Secure your frontend against iFrame-based threats by mastering techniques to safeguard embedded content and prevent potential vulnerabilities.

content.heading: Security Headers
content.description: Implement security headers effectively to fortify your frontend against various threats, leveraging key configurations for enhanced protection.

content.heading: Client-side Security
content.description: Master best practices and tools for ensuring robust client-side security in your frontend architecture.

content.heading: Secure Communication (HTTPs)
content.description: Safeguard data transfer using advanced HTTP security measures, ensuring secure communication in your frontend applications.

content.heading: Dependency Security
content.description: Learn to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities in third-party dependencies, fortifying your frontend against potential risks.

content.heading: Compliance & Regulation
content.description: Navigate complex compliance standards, ensuring your frontend adheres to regulations, mitigating legal and security risks effectively.

content.heading: Input Validation and Sanitization
content.description: Master the art of input validation and sanitization, safeguarding your frontend against various security threats originating from user inputs.

content.heading: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)
content.description: Identify and counter SSRF threats, ensuring robust security for your frontend servers against unauthorized requests.

content.heading: Server-side JavaScript Injection (SSJI)
content.description: Protect your frontend against malicious server-side JavaScript injections, preserving system integrity.

content.heading: Feature Policy | Permissions-Policy
content.description: Leverage feature and permissions policies for strengthened frontend security, managing browser behaviors and permissions effectively.

content.heading: Subresource Integrity (SRI)
content.description: Ensure resource integrity by implementing SRI, safeguarding resources loaded into your frontend against tampering.

content.heading: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS)
content.description: Manage CORS effectively for secure cross-origin data sharing within your frontend applications.

content.heading: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
content.description: Prevent Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks for enhanced security.

content.heading: Networking - Akshay & Chirag's ExperiencePreview
content.description: Akshay and Chirag are sharing their experience on Networking.

content.heading: How the Web Works
content.description: Explore the fundamental mechanics powering the internet, unveiling the intricate workings behind web functionality.

content.heading: Communication Protocols
content.description: Delve into diverse communication protocols shaping internet interactions, laying the groundwork for efficient data exchange.

content.heading: REST APIs
content.description: Uncover the principles of REST APIs, mastering the art of building robust and scalable interfaces for web applications.

content.heading: GraphQL
content.description: Explore the power of GraphQL, enabling efficient data querying and manipulation for modern web applications.

content.heading: gRPC
content.description: Master gRPC, a high-performance remote procedure call framework, optimizing communication between distributed systems.

content.heading: Testing - Akshay & Chirag's ExperiencePreview
content.description: Akshay and Chirag are sharing their experience on Testing.

content.heading: Testing Overview
content.description: Explore the pivotal role of testing in frontend development, grasping the fundamentals shaping robust testing strategies.

content.heading: Unit & Integration Testing
content.description: Master the art of unit testing, dissecting individual components to ensure their functionality in isolation.

content.heading: E2E and Automation Testing
content.description: Master end-to-end testing methodologies to simulate user scenarios, ensuring holistic frontend functionality.

content.heading: A/B Testing
content.description: Discover A/B testing strategies to compare variations and optimize frontend design and functionality.

content.heading: Performance Testing
content.description: Performance testing ensures software functions optimally under diverse conditions, simulating scenarios to identify and address bottlenecks, guaranteeing a seamless user experience.

content.heading: Test-Driven Development Overview
content.description: Understand the principles and advantages of test-driven development (TDD) as a foundational approach in frontend design.

content.heading: Security Testing
content.description: Security testing safeguards software by detecting and addressing vulnerabilities, ensuring data protection and resistance against cyber threats.

content.heading: [BONUS] Namaste React - Time for Test
content.description: Reliability is paramount, and in this episode, we cover testing for React components. You'll learn how to ensure your components work as expected and your app remains robust.

content.description: Akshay and Chirag are sharing their experience with Communication.

content.heading: Communication Overview
content.description: Explore the foundational aspects of communication protocols, shaping seamless data exchange in modern frontend systems.

content.heading: Short Polling
content.description: Learn the short polling technique to acquire updated data at regular intervals, optimizing real-time updates in frontend applications.

content.heading: Long Polling
content.description: Understand long polling mechanisms, facilitating continuous connections to servers for real-time data updates in frontend interfaces.

content.heading: Web Sockets
content.description: Master Web Sockets for establishing persistent, bidirectional communication channels between clients and servers in frontend systems.

content.heading: Server Side Events
content.description: Explore Server-Sent Events enabling servers to push data to frontend clients, facilitating seamless real-time updates.

content.heading: WebHooks
content.description: Grasp WebHooks' capabilities in facilitating instant notifications and triggering events in frontend systems, enhancing responsiveness.

content.heading: Local Storage
content.description: Master local storage techniques for storing persistent data within the user's browser, enhancing offline capabilities.

content.description: Understand session storage mechanisms for storing temporary data within the user's browser session, ensuring data availability during the session.

content.description: Grasp cookie storage methods for managing and storing small pieces of data in the user's browser, facilitating personalized experiences.

content.heading: Indexed DB
content.description: Master Indexed DB, enabling frontend applications to manage large amounts of structured data within the user's browser.

content.heading: Normalization
content.description: Understand normalization principles for organizing data in databases, optimizing data storage and retrieval efficiency.

content.heading: HTTP Caching
content.description: Grasp HTTP caching methodologies for storing web server responses in browsers, optimizing data retrieval and system performance.

content.heading: Service Working Caching
content.description: Master service working caching techniques for storing static assets and enhancing the offline capabilities of frontend applications.

content.heading: API Caching
content.description: Understand API caching strategies for caching API responses, reducing server load and enhancing frontend application responsiveness.

content.heading: State Management
content.description: Explore state management techniques for maintaining and managing application states, ensuring seamless user experiences in frontend systems.
